tasks.title: Linear Algebra - Vectors and Vector Spaces
tasks.description: Study vectors, vector addition, and scalar multiplication from 'Linear Algebra and Its Applications' by Gilbert Strang, Sections 1.1-1.2.

tasks.title: Linear Algebra - Matrices and Matrix Operations
tasks.description: Learn about matrices, matrix addition, multiplication, and transpose operations.

tasks.title: Linear Algebra - Systems of Linear Equations
tasks.description: Study solving systems of equations and Gaussian elimination methods.

tasks.title: Calculus - Functions, Limits, and Continuity
tasks.description: Review functions, limits, and continuity as they apply to machine learning.
resources: Stewart's Calculus Textbook, Selected Sections from Chapters 1-2

tasks.title: Calculus - Derivatives and Differentiation Rules
tasks.description: Learn differentiation rules, including the product, quotient, and chain rules.
resources: Stewart's Calculus Textbook, Sections on Differentiation

tasks.title: Calculus - Partial Derivatives and Gradients
tasks.description: Understand partial derivatives and gradients in multivariable functions.
resources: Stewart's Calculus Textbook, Sections on Partial Derivatives

tasks.title: Review Day
tasks.description: Review all topics covered during the week.

tasks.title: Linear Algebra - Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors
tasks.description: Learn about eigenvalues and eigenvectors and their significance in machine learning.
resources: Strang's Linear Algebra Textbook, Sections on Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors

tasks.title: Linear Algebra - Singular Value Decomposition (SVD)
tasks.description: Study SVD and its applications in machine learning, such as dimensionality reduction.
resources: Strang's Linear Algebra Textbook, Sections on SVD

tasks.title: Optimization - Gradient Descent
tasks.description: Introduction to optimization techniques, focusing on gradient descent algorithms.
resources: Lecture Notes on Optimization Methods in Machine Learning

tasks.title: Machine Learning - Andrew Ng's Course Week 1
tasks.description: Start Andrew Ng's Machine Learning course on Coursera. Complete Week 1 lectures and quiz.

tasks.title: Machine Learning - Linear Regression with One Variable
tasks.description: Learn about cost functions and gradient descent in linear regression.

tasks.title: Machine Learning - Linear Regression with Multiple Variables
tasks.description: Understand linear regression with multiple variables and feature scaling.

tasks.title: Review Day
tasks.description: Review optimization techniques and linear regression concepts.

tasks.title: Machine Learning - Logistic Regression
tasks.description: Learn about logistic regression for classification tasks and decision boundaries.

tasks.title: Machine Learning - Neural Networks Basics
tasks.description: Introduction to neural networks and forward propagation algorithms.

tasks.title: Machine Learning - Backpropagation Algorithm
tasks.description: Understand the backpropagation algorithm and how neural networks learn.

tasks.title: Deep Learning - Introduction
tasks.description: Begin studying deep learning concepts and architectures.
resources: 'Deep Learning' by Goodfellow, Bengio, and Courville, Chapter 1

tasks.title: Deep Learning Frameworks - TensorFlow or PyTorch
tasks.description: Install and set up TensorFlow or PyTorch; follow introductory tutorials.

tasks.title: GPU Programming - Introduction to CUDA
tasks.description: Learn the basics of parallel computing and GPU programming with CUDA.

tasks.title: Review Day
tasks.description: Review deep learning concepts and GPU programming basics.
